content:
4.3 AFOLU-Specific Safeguards

Not Applicable.

4.4 Accuracy of GHG Emission Reduction and Removal Calculations

The verification team was able to confirm that the monitoring plan contained in registered VCS- PD/05/ and MR/1.2/ is in accordance with the approved large scale methodology applied for the project activity ie. “ACMOO02 ver. 16 - Grid-connected electricity generation from renewable sources” /07/ and its applicable tools.

All parameters stated in the monitoring plan /O5/ and the applied methodology /07/ have been fulfilled in the current monitoring period.

The GHG emission reductions were correctly calculated on the basis of the applied methodology ACMOO002 Version 16.0 /07/, VCS-PD /05/ and the formulae given in the monitoring report /1.2/.
